items.summary: Create a top-level `README.md` at the repository root suitable for pushing to GitHub, documenting the DarkPattern Shield project in English. The README must include: (1) project overview, (2) key pages/routes and what they do (Home `/`, Subscription Trap Detector `/detector`, Personal Digital Risk Test `/risk-test`, Scam Reporting `/report`, Browser Extension Concept `/extension`), (3) prerequisites (Node, pnpm, DFX), (4) local development run steps for the Internet Computer canister (`dfx start`, `dfx deploy`) and for the React frontend dev server, (5) a brief note explaining authentication via Internet Identity (what the user experiences at a high level), and (6) how to export/download the full source code using the existing export scripts and the exported `README_EXPORT.md` behavior (copied from `frontend/SOURCE_CODE_EXPORT.md`).
